TopicTitle: Fast low-gravity rover - The Ground Hogger

Articles.Content:

Heh, this does look like fun, although I'm not entirely sure it's a rover per se... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Heh, this does look like fun, although I'm not entirely sure it's a rover per se... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It's got wheels, movement, usage and besides, it's awesome.

Why is the Mun purple in the little preview screen? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Cool rover!

> 
> Why is the Mun purple in the little preview screen? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

 It's "Free Purple Thursday" on YouTube.

The rover is like sanic

gotta go fast

also does anyone else gets recommended to watch jeep videos?

I've made a more stable version for places like Minmus. You can belt along at 100m/s+ in a straight line with little risk of tipping.

Or you can put the throttle at 10%, save fuel and circumnavigate Minmus at 50m/s. 

At slower speeds it handles well, doesn't skip about and won't tip unless you really try. 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jc-GhwMzr5M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Someone want to try it? Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/w0oew0qloos6ma1/Sticky%20rover%203.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/w0oew0qloos6ma1/Sticky%20rover%203.craft?dl=0)
